perturbation.changed_text: EXCEPT FOR A BREACH OF SECTION 8 (CONFIDENTIALITY), IN NO EVENT WILL EITHER PARTY BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES, NOR FOR ANY DAMAGES RELATING TO LOST DATA, ADVERTISING OR PROMOTIONAL COSTS, TERMINATION OF EMPLOYEES, OR FUTURE EXPECTATIONS OR OTHER ECONOMIC ADVANTAGE, HOWSOEVER ARISING AND REGARDLESS OF THE FORM OF ACTION, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, WARRANTY OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE) OR UNDER ANY OTHER THEORY OF LIABILITY IN LAW OR IN EQUITY, EVEN IF SUCH PARTY HAS BEEN PREVIOUSLY ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.
perturbation.explanation: The removal of 'PUNITIVE' and 'EXEMPLARY' damages clauses limits liability, undermining consumer rights to seek full compensation as permitted under Colorado law. 'LOST PROFITS, SALARIES OF EMPLOYEES OR SEVERANCE PAYMENTS, CREATION OF CUSTOMER BASE' has also been removed, creating another limitation
perturbation.contradicted_law: Colorado Revised Statutes regarding damages and liability.

perturbation.changed_text: THE WARRANTIES, IF ANY, PROVIDED IN THIS AGREEMENT (INCLUDING THE APPENDICES AND CHANNEL NOTIFICATION DOCUMENTS) OR AS PROVIDED WITH THE PRODUCTS ARE GIVEN IN LIEU OF ALL OTHER WARRANTIES, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING ANY IMPLIED WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, ALL OF WHICH ARE HEREBY EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMED AND EXCLUDED.
perturbation.explanation: Removing 'NONINFRINGEMENT' warranty clause significantly weakens consumer protection. Colorado law implies a warranty of noninfringement, ensuring that products sold do not violate intellectual property rights. This omission exposes the reseller and end-user to potential legal risks.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Uniform Commercial Code (UCC) provisions as adopted in Colorado regarding implied warranties.
